meanings.definition: Covered in a sticky or slimy substance
meanings.sent1: The gooey candy became gooky after being left in the sun.
meanings.sent2: Her hands were gooky after playing with the slime.
meanings.sent3: The gooky situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The gooky mess was like trying to clean up spilled honey.
meanings.sent5: The gooky texture was unpleasant to touch.

meanings.sent1: The alien's skin looked gooky under the bright lights.
meanings.sent2: The gooky substance oozed out of the container.
meanings.sent3: The gooky appearance of the cake made it look futuristic.
meanings.sent4: The gooky material felt like touching a strange alien lifeform.
meanings.sent5: The gooky consistency was unlike anything she had seen before.

meanings.sent1: The gooky mud splattered all over his clothes.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen was gooky after the baking session.
meanings.sent3: She tried to clean the gooky room but ended up making it messier.
meanings.sent4: The gooky paint on the walls gave the room a unique charm.
meanings.sent5: The gooky appearance of the street made her avoid walking through it.
